thread.title: Paris visit
thread.title_full: Paris visit - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jovans720
title: Paris visit
text:
On a trip, It is one less thing to worry about if your accommodation is very comfortable and delivers a high quality of service. It also makes your holiday a pleasant and remarkable one. Security is strict that makes me feel really safe and at home. The breakfast is well organised and served fresh (hot or cold).
Room Tip: Twin bed with a view of the train and seine river See more room tips
